features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Implements secure user registration, login, logout, and session management.

tasks.title: Set up authentication backend
tasks.description: Implement backend endpoints for user registration, login, logout, and session validation.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use JWT tokens for authentication. Store passwords hashed with bcrypt. Endpoints: POST /register, POST /login, POST /logout, GET /session.

tasks.title: Integrate authentication in frontend
tasks.description: Create registration and login forms. Handle authentication state and token storage.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use React Context or Redux for auth state. Store JWT in HttpOnly cookies or secure localStorage.

tasks.title: Protect task endpoints
tasks.description: Ensure all task-related API endpoints require valid authentication.
tasks.technicalNotes: Add authentication middleware to all /tasks routes. Return 401 Unauthorized if token is missing or invalid.

features.name: Task CRUD Operations
features.description: Allow users to create, read, update, and delete tasks.

tasks.title: Design Task data model
tasks.description: Define the Task schema in the database with id, title, status, and user association.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use a relational DB (e.g., PostgreSQL) or NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB). Fields: id (UUID), title (string), status (enum: 'todo', 'in-progress', 'done'), userId (foreign key).

tasks.title: Implement Task API endpoints
tasks.description: Create RESTful endpoints for task CRUD: create, get all, get by id, update, delete.
tasks.technicalNotes: Endpoints: POST /tasks, GET /tasks, GET /tasks/:id, PUT /tasks/:id, DELETE /tasks/:id. Ensure endpoints are protected and scoped to authenticated user.

tasks.title: Build Task management UI
tasks.description: Develop frontend components for listing, creating, editing, and deleting tasks.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use React components for TaskList, TaskForm, and TaskItem. Connect to API using fetch/axios. Handle optimistic UI updates.

features.name: Task Status Management
features.description: Enable users to update the status of tasks (e.g., todo, in-progress, done).

tasks.title: Status field validation
tasks.description: Ensure only valid status values can be set on tasks.
tasks.technicalNotes: Validate status on backend using enum or allowed values. Return 400 Bad Request on invalid status.

tasks.title: UI for status updates
tasks.description: Allow users to change task status via dropdown or buttons in the UI.
tasks.technicalNotes: Update TaskItem component to include status control. Trigger PUT /tasks/:id on change.

features.name: User-specific Task Isolation
features.description: Ensure each user can only access their own tasks.

tasks.title: Associate tasks with users
tasks.description: Link each task to the authenticated user in the database.
tasks.technicalNotes: Add userId field to Task model. On task creation, set userId from JWT. Filter all task queries by userId.

tasks.title: Enforce task access control
tasks.description: Restrict task API endpoints so users cannot access or modify others' tasks.
tasks.technicalNotes: In each endpoint, check that the task's userId matches the authenticated user. Return 403 Forbidden if not.

features.name: Basic UI/UX Design
features.description: Provide a clean and intuitive interface for task management and authentication.

tasks.title: Design layout and navigation
tasks.description: Create a basic layout with navigation for authentication and task management screens.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use a component library (e.g., Material-UI) for consistent styling. Implement routing with React Router.

tasks.title: Error and loading states
tasks.description: Handle and display errors and loading indicators in the UI.
tasks.technicalNotes: Show error messages from API responses. Use spinners or skeletons during API calls.
